block.p: American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed OF Tim Salmon on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF Jeff DaVanon from Salt Lake of the PCL. Activated C Jose Molina from the 15-day DL and optioned him to Salt Lake. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Recalled RHP Danys Baez from Buffalo of the International League. Optioned RHP Roy Smith to Buffalo. YANKEES--Placed OF David Justice on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF-OF Clay Bellinger from Columbus of the International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Placed 3B Ken Caminiti on irrevocable waivers for the purpose of giving him his unconditional release. Placed RHP J.D. Smart on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to July 1. Recalled RHP Aaron Myette from Oklahoma of the PCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Agreed to terms with RHP Brandon League, OF Tyrell Godwin, SS Michael Rouse and LHP Christopher Neylan.

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed OF Tim Salmon on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF Jeff DaVanon from Salt Lake of the PCL. Activated C Jose Molina from the 15-day DL and optioned him to Salt Lake. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Recalled RHP Danys Baez from Buffalo of the International League. Optioned RHP Roy Smith to Buffalo. YANKEES--Placed OF David Justice on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF-OF Clay Bellinger from Columbus of the International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Placed 3B Ken Caminiti on irrevocable waivers for the purpose of giving him his unconditional release. Placed RHP J.D. Smart on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to July 1. Recalled RHP Aaron Myette from Oklahoma of the PCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Agreed to terms with RHP Brandon League, OF Tyrell Godwin, SS Michael Rouse and LHP Christopher Neylan.

National League CINCINANTI REDS--Activated LHP Dennys Reyes off 15-day disabled list and optioned him to Louisville of the International League. Assigned RHP Osvaldo Fernandez outright to Louisville. Signed RHP Jose Rijo to a minor league contract. COLORADO ROCKIES--Signed RHP Dan Miceli to a minor league contract. FLORIDA MARLINS -- Placed CF Preston Wilson on the 15-day disabled list.

LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Agreed to terms with SS Irvin Joel Guzman. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Placed RHP Paul Rigdon on 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF Alex Sanchez from Indianapolis of the International League. METS--Signed RHP Jason Weintraub and C Tyler Beuerlein. Assigned Weintraub to Kingsport of the Appalachian League and Beuerlein to Brooklyn of the New York-Penn League. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Agreed to terms with OF Cedric Brooks.

National Football League BUFFALO BILLS--Released WR Stephen Campbell, WR Teddy Johnson and C Ryan Diepenbrock. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Signed CB Leonard Myers. TENNESSEE TITANS--Agreed to terms with CB Michael Booker.

National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Acquired LW Denny Lambert from Atlanta for future considerations. ATLANTA THRASHERS--Agreed to terms with F Hnat Domenichelli. BOSTON BRUINS--Signed RW Martin Lapointe to a four-year contract and D Sean O'Donnell to a three-year contract. CALGARY FLAMES--Signed D Bob Boughner to a three-year contract. DALLAS STARS--Signed RW Donald Audette to a four-year contract. LOS ANGELES KINGS--Re-signed D Mathieu Schneider to a three-year contract, and signed LW Ken Belanger and D Brett Hauer to two-year contracts. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed C Darby Hendrickson to a three-year contract. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Signed LW Stu Grimson to a two-year contract. OTTAWA SENATORS--Re-signed D Curtis Leschyshyn to a multiyear contract. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Signed C Jeremy Roenick to a five-year contract. PHOENIX COYOTES--Acquired C Daymond Langkow from Philadelphia for two future draft choices.
